summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6083 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 5, Ridgewood Addition, being the alley between 34th Avenue Southwest and 35th Avenue Southwest from West Findlay Street to West Juneau Street; and certain other streets and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 83713, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
